name: Creamy Escargot Soup
author: Leo
summary: This delicious and creamy recipe is quick to make at the last minute. It's out of the ordinary, but definitely an eye opener. Try it, you won't be disappointed! Hope you enjoy; if so, please leave a rating. Cheers!
ingredients: 1 (7 ounce) can escargots, cut in half, save the liquid
directions: Melt the butter in a large saucepan over medium-high heat
Whisk in the flour, and cook for 3 minutes, whisking constantly
Whisk in the green onion, and cook for 1 minute more
Pour in the chicken broth, celery, parsley, and pepper; bring to a simmer, and cook 5 minutes, stirring constantly
Dissolve the cornstarch in a little milk, and add to the simmering soup along with the remaining milk
Cook, whisking frequently, until the soup has thickened and has returned to a simmer, about 8 minutes
Whisk in the sour cream and the liquid from the can of escargots; return to a bare simmer, and cook for 5 minutes
Stir in the halved escargots, and cook for 1 minute more until warm
